greenmirror

Class StoredBytesImage

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.image.Image
      • greenmirror.StoredBytesImage

  • public class StoredBytesImage
extends Image
    An extension of Image that also saves the bytes of the image itself in the Image object. This way, it's easier to get a (base64 encoded) string representation of the image.

    There is one difficulty here: this object can't simply read the bytes from the InputStream again to retrieve the bytes. The internal pointer messes that up. Therefore, one should first use readBytes(InputStream) to get the bytes, then instantiate the object and finally set them by using setBytes(byte[]).

    Author:
    Karim El Assal
